Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Rich Hill?

Rich Hill is 45 years old.

When was Rich Hill born?

Rich Hill was born on March 11, 1980.

Where was Rich Hill born?

Rich Hill was born in Boston, MA.

How tall is Rich Hill?

Rich Hill is 6-5 (196 cm) tall.

How much did Rich Hill weigh when playing?

Rich Hill weighed 220 lbs (99 kg) when playing.

How many seasons did Rich Hill play?

Rich Hill played 20 seasons.

Is Rich Hill in the Hall of Fame?

Rich Hill has not been elected into the Hall of Fame.

When was Rich Hill drafted?

Rich Hill was drafted by the Cincinnati Reds in the 36th round of the 1999 MLB June Amateur Draft from Milton HS (Milton, MA), the Anaheim Angels in the 7th round of the 2001 MLB June Amateur Draft from University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI) and the Chicago Cubs in the 4th round of the 2002 MLB June Amateur Draft from University of Michigan (Ann Arbor, MI).

What position did Rich Hill play?

Rich Hill was a Pitcher.

How many strikeouts did Rich Hill have?

Rich Hill had 1,428 strikeouts over his career.

How many teams has Rich Hill played for?

Rich Hill played for 13 teams; the Chicago Cubs, Baltimore Orioles, Boston Red Sox, Cleveland Indians, Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim, New York Yankees, Los Angeles Dodgers, Oakland Athletics, Minnesota Twins, New York Mets, Tampa Bay Rays, Pittsburgh Pirates and San Diego Padres.

When did Rich Hill retire?

Rich Hill last played in 2024.

What are Rich Hill's nicknames?

Brice, D. Mountain, Field of Genes are nicknames for Rich Hill.
